sqlMap.insert: insert into Location(ctg_num, cos_num, loc_num, step_num, loc_name, loc_content, loc_pic, loc_pic1, rate, readCount, likeCount) values( #ctg_num#, #cos_num#, loc_seq.NEXTVAL, #step_num#, #loc_name#, #loc_content#, #loc_pic#, #loc_pic1#, #rate#, #readCount#, #likeCount# )
sqlMap.select: select ctg_num, ctg_name, ctg_img, r from (select ctg_num, ctg_name, ctg_img, rownum r from (select ctg_num, ctg_name, ctg_img from ctg)) where r>=#startRow# and r<=#endRow#
select * from course where ctg_num=#ctg_num# and cos_num=#cos_num#
select map_img, cos_img from course where cos_num=#cos_num#
select loc_pic, loc_pic1 from location where loc_num=#loc_num#
select pw from dc_member where id = #id#
select count(step_num) from location where ctg_num=#ctg_num# and cos_num=#cos_num#
select count(*) from course where ctg_num = #ctg_num#
select cos_name, map_img, cos_img, content, readCount from course where cos_num = #cos_num#
select ctg_num , cos_num , loc_num, step_num, loc_pic from location where ctg_num = #ctg_num# and cos_num = #cos_num# order by #step_num# desc
select step_num, loc_name, loc_content, rate, loc_pic, loc_pic1,readCount from location where loc_num = #loc_num#
select count(*) from dc_member where id = #id# and pw = #pw#
sqlMap.update: update ctg set ctg_name=#ctg_name#, ctg_img=#ctg_img# where ctg_num=#ctg_num#
update ctg set ctg_name=#ctg_name# where ctg_num=#ctg_num#
update course set cos_name=#cos_name#, cos_img=#cos_img#, map_img=#map_img#, content=#content# where ctg_num=#ctg_num# and cos_num=#cos_num#
update location set loc_name=#loc_name#, loc_content=#loc_content#, loc_pic=#loc_pic#, loc_pic1=#loc_pic1#, rate=#rate# where loc_num=#loc_num#
update course set readCount = readCount + 1 where cos_num = #cos_num#
update location set readCount = readCount + 1 where loc_num = #loc_num#
sqlMap.delete: delete from course where ctg_num = #ctg_num# and cos_num = #cos_num#
